name: Constellation Cleaners
description:
Welcome to S.U.C.C - Stellar United Celestial Cleaners! 

Constellation Cleaners is a 2-player cooperative game in which players take control of two veteran space janitors, Jade and Moo-na. Armed with specialized vacuums and tools, players must work together to clean up litter, rescue local wildlife, and solve puzzles! In accordance with SpOSHA* laws, however, players must be bound by an elastic tether for the whole game. Teamwork makes the dream work!

*SpOSHA stands for "Space OSHA." Failure to comply with intergalatic SpOSHA regulations will result in heavy fines and risk of termination of business.


Game features include:

  • Couch co-op gameplay
  • Keyboard and Xbox controller compatibility
  • Elastic tether physics
  • Island exploration
